title: BMMJ02
description: PLC communication cable disconnected or PLC is in error mode.
reasons_remedies: The communication between the PLC and the operator panel gets disconnected.
Check that the communication cable is connected correctly.
Check if the PLC and the operator panel communication port are working correctly."
Reset the alarm after appropriate remedies.
text_for_embedding:
Error Code BMMJ02
Error Code 02
Category: BMMJ
Title: BMMJ02
Alarm Message: PLC SCADA Communiaction Failed
Description: PLC communication cable disconnected or PLC is in error mode.
Reason & Remedy:
1. The communication between the PLC and the operator panel gets disconnected.
2. Check that the communication cable is connected correctly.
3. Check if the PLC and the operator panel communication port are working correctly."
4. Reset the alarm after appropriate remedies.
5. (Communication Cable Location)
Visual References:
- Communication Cable
